DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect combination ETN MTX MTX alone radiographic change clinical disease activity subject early RA 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Etanercept Methotrexate vs. Methotrexate Alone Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Satisfies 1987 ACR Revised Criteria Rheumatoid Arthritis Has RA great equal 3 month less equal 2 year Received previous treatment MTX Received previous treatment ETN tumour necrosis factor antagonist
